NewsArticle.Title: DA Patch 7.40 + Updates
NewsArticle.Content: DA Version 7.40 On Wednesday, January 27th, Dark Ages will be patching to version 7.40 Patching Issues with Vista & Windows7/8/10: If you are having problems with the automatic patch, please "right-click" on your Darkages icon and choose "Run as administrator" You can also download the complete installer. Click here to go to our download page. Patch notes * Updated monsters in Lost Ruins * Updated monsters in Muisir Hunting Grounds
